full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA BKRA SHIS KYI SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DGE SEMS TOBS LAS BYUNG BA DPAL PHUN SUM TSOGS PA 'PHAGS PA BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS 'DI NAS PHAN YON RAB 'BRING MTHA' GSUM GYI BKRA SHIS PA GSON GSHIN GNYIS KYIS BKRA MI SHIS PA LA SOGS PA THAMS CAD RAB TU ZHI BAR 'GYUR RO, ,GRANGS LAS 'DAS PA DPAG TU MED PA'I BKRA SHIS KYI SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DON DU BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' MCHOG PO LAS SPYI BA BRTEN TE BZHUGS PA LAS 'DUS PAR BYA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
